title: Watch: Hundreds of sheep cross historic German city during annual tradition
text:
People in Nuremberg watched hundreds of sheep being herded through the city on their way to winter pastures.

The event, which saw about 600 sheep cross the city's historic centre, has become a popular annual tradition.
summary: The event, which saw about 600 sheep cross the Nuremberg's historic centre, took place on Sunday and has become a popular annual tradition.
